prompt:
The legendary Lu Xian brothel exterior at evening, a masterwork of Song Dynasty architecture with high ceilings supported by lacquered red wooden columns carved with golden dragons. Silk banners in crimson and gold flutter from curved eaves as warm amber light spills from every window. Wealthy patrons in fine silk robes ascend stone steps past red-lacquered pillars. Wide establishing shot, eye-level, 24mm wide-angle lens. Dozens of silk-shaded oil lanterns cast warm amber pools (#FFBF00) against the blue evening darkness (#1a237e). Color palette: deep crimson (#8B0000), gold (#FFD700), warm amber (#FFBF00). Style: live_action, photorealistic, cinematic composition.

-- WORLD BIBLE CONTEXT --
[LOC_BROTHEL]: The legendary brothel's central entertaining hall, a masterwork of Song Dynasty interior design. High ceilings supported by lacquered red wooden columns with gold-leaf carved dragons. Dark wood paneled walls inset with silk screens painted with mountains and orchids. Polished dark wood floors covered with fine woven mats and silk cushions in reds and golds arranged around low lacquered tables. Carved wooden lattice screens creating semi-private alcoves. Bronze incense burners trailing fragrant smoke. A raised platform serves as performance stage. Silk banners hang from ceiling beams. Porcelain vases hold fresh flowers. Every surface speaks of luxury and refinement.

Elegant older Chinese woman [CHAR_MADAME_CHOU] with oval face, prominent cheekbones, and strong jawline, skin pale and powdered showing fine lines like crackled porcelain, sharp black kohl-lined eyes heavy-lidded and knowing, thin arched brows, thin red-painted lips curved in cold satisfaction. Wearing heavy embroidered outer robe in deep plum purple (#4A0D67) with gold phoenixes and peonies, wide sleeves lined with crimson. Standing on raised platform surveying the brothel hall. Medium shot, slight low-angle, 50mm lens. Warm amber candlelight from silk-shaded oil lanterns casting golden glow across her regal features. Color palette: plum purple (#4A0D67), gold (#FFD700), crimson (#DC143C). Style: live_action, photorealistic, cinematic composition.

-- WORLD BIBLE CONTEXT --
[CHAR_MADAME_CHOU]: An elegant older woman retaining echoes of former beauty in her bone structure. Oval face with prominent cheekbones and strong jawline, skin pale and powdered showing fine lines like crackled porcelain. Sharp black eyes heavy-lidded and knowing, outlined with kohl. Thin arched brows maintained with precision. Straight nose with refined nostrils. Thin lips often pressed together in calculation, painted deep red. Hair still mostly black with distinguished silver streaks, elaborately styled with multiple loops, pins, and ornaments. Slender and rigidly upright refusing to stoop with age. Elegant hands with long fingernails painted red. Formal attire befitting an establishment's madam. Heavy embroidered outer robe in deep plum purple (#4A0D67) with gold phoenixes and peonies. Wide sleeves lined with crimson that flash when moving. Inner robe of black silk. Broad gold and red brocade sash. Elaborate headdress with gold pins, jade ornaments, and silk flowers. Multiple jade bracelets stacked on wrists. Embroidered silk slippers.
[LOC_BROTHEL]: The legendary brothel's central entertaining hall, a masterwork of Song Dynasty interior design. High ceilings supported by lacquered red wooden columns with gold-leaf carved dragons. Dark wood paneled walls inset with silk screens painted with mountains and orchids. Polished dark wood floors covered with fine woven mats and silk cushions in reds and golds arranged around low lacquered tables. Carved wooden lattice screens creating semi-private alcoves. Bronze incense burners trailing fragrant smoke.

Corpulent Chinese merchant [CHAR_MIN_ZHU] with round fleshy face, small calculating eyes nearly lost in pouched lids, thin eyebrows, broad nose with flared nostrils, wine-stained full lips in self-satisfied smirk, thinning oiled black hair in neat topknot with jade pin, multiple chins, wearing heavy burgundy silk outer robe (#722F37) with elaborate gold-thread embroidery, gold brocade sash straining around considerable belly, jade pendant, multiple jade and gold rings. Sitting opposite a military general at low lacquered table, both gazing hungrily at performance stage. Two-shot composition, eye-level, 35mm lens. Warm amber oil lantern light casting golden pools across their faces. Color palette: burgundy (#722F37), gold (#FFD700), amber (#FFBF00). Style: live_action, photorealistic, cinematic composition.

-- WORLD BIBLE CONTEXT --
[CHAR_MIN_ZHU]: A corpulent man with a round, fleshy face showing the prosperity of successful commerce. Small calculating eyes nearly lost in pouched lids, dark and sharp with mercantile cunning. Thin eyebrows above. A broad nose with flared nostrils. Full lips naturally curved into a self-satisfied smirk, often stained from wine. His skin is pale and soft from a life lived indoors, with a slightly oily sheen. Thinning black hair oiled and pulled into a neat topknot secured with a jade pin. Multiple chins flow into a thick neck. Heavy-set body with a pronounced belly. Thick fingers adorned with jade and gold rings, soft and uncallused with long manicured nails. Extravagantly wealthy attire. Heavy silk outer robe in rich burgundy (#722F37) with elaborate gold-thread embroidery depicting coins and auspicious symbols. Inner robe of fine cream silk visible at collar. Wide gold brocade sash (#D4AF37) straining around his considerable middle with a carved jade pendant. Black silk merchant's cap with jade ornament indicating rank. Soft leather boots of finest quality. Multiple rings on his fingers - jade, gold, and carved agate.
[LOC_BROTHEL]: The legendary brothel's central entertaining hall, a masterwork of Song Dynasty interior design. High ceilings supported by lacquered red wooden columns with gold-leaf carved dragons. Dark wood paneled walls inset with silk screens painted with mountains and orchids. Polished dark wood floors covered with fine woven mats and silk cushions in reds and golds arranged around low lacquered tables.

Breathtakingly beautiful young Chinese woman [CHAR_MEI] with delicate oval face, flawless porcelain skin with warm undertone, large almond-shaped deep brown eyes framed by thick dark lashes, elegantly arched brows, high cheekbones, small refined nose, full rose-pink lips with perfect cupid's bow, lustrous black silk hair elaborately styled with jade hairpins and crimson ribbon (#DC143C). Wearing cerulean blue (#1E90FF) silk hanfu with silver-thread orchid embroidery, ruqun style with high-waisted flowing skirt, wide sleeves. Dancing on raised platform, movements liquid and graceful, silk sleeves arcing through candlelight. Wide shot, eye-level, 35mm lens. Warm amber candlelight from dozens of oil lanterns illuminating the stage. Color palette: cerulean blue (#1E90FF), crimson (#DC143C), gold (#FFD700), amber (#FFBF00). Style: live_action, photorealistic, cinematic composition.

-- WORLD BIBLE CONTEXT --
[CHAR_MEI]: A breathtakingly beautiful young woman with a delicate oval face and flawless porcelain skin with a subtle warm undertone. Her eyes are large and almond-shaped, deep brown almost black, framed by naturally thick dark lashes and elegantly arched brows that taper to fine points. High cheekbones create gentle shadows beneath. Her nose is small and refined with a softly rounded tip. Full lips naturally tinted rose-pink, the upper lip forming a perfect cupid's bow. Her hair is lustrous black silk reaching past her waist when unbound, thick and straight with a healthy gleam. Slender build with graceful long neck, narrow shoulders, and elegant hands with tapered fingers kept immaculately smooth. A small beauty mark sits just below her left eye. Primary hanfu in cerulean blue (#1E90FF) silk with subtle embroidered orchid patterns in silver thread. The ruqun style features a high-waisted flowing skirt and cross-collared upper garment with wide sleeves. A pale ivory silk inner robe visible at the neckline. Wide sash of deep blue silk cinches at the high waist. Hair elaborately styled with jade hairpins and silver ornaments, with a significant crimson silk ribbon (#DC143C) binding a section.
[LOC_BROTHEL]: The legendary brothel's central entertaining hall, a masterwork of Song Dynasty interior design. High ceilings supported by lacquered red wooden columns with gold-leaf carved dragons. A raised platform serves as performance stage. Silk banners hang from ceiling beams.

Young Chinese woman [CHAR_MEI]'s face in intimate close-up, delicate oval face with flawless porcelain skin, large almond-shaped deep brown eyes holding hidden depths of melancholy behind practiced seduction, thick dark lashes, elegantly arched brows, high cheekbones, small refined nose, full rose-pink lips. Her gaze drifts momentarily toward a window, longing visible in her expression. Close-up shot, eye-level, 85mm portrait lens, shallow depth of field. Warm amber candlelight from oil lanterns casting soft golden glow on her face, gentle shadows on the right side. Color palette: porcelain skin tones, deep brown eyes, rose-pink (#FFB6C1) lips, amber (#FFBF00) highlights. Style: live_action, photorealistic, cinematic composition.

-- WORLD BIBLE CONTEXT --
[CHAR_MEI]: A breathtakingly beautiful young woman with a delicate oval face and flawless porcelain skin with a subtle warm undertone. Her eyes are large and almond-shaped, deep brown almost black, framed by naturally thick dark lashes and elegantly arched brows that taper to fine points. High cheekbones create gentle shadows beneath. Her nose is small and refined with a softly rounded tip. Full lips naturally tinted rose-pink, the upper lip forming a perfect cupid's bow. Her hair is lustrous black silk reaching past her waist when unbound, thick and straight with a healthy gleam. Slender build with graceful long neck, narrow shoulders. A small beauty mark sits just below her left eye. Hair elaborately styled with jade hairpins and silver ornaments, with a significant crimson silk ribbon (#DC143C) binding a section.
[LOC_BROTHEL]: The legendary brothel's central entertaining hall, a masterwork of Song Dynasty interior design. High ceilings supported by lacquered red wooden columns with gold-leaf carved dragons. Dozens of silk-shaded oil lanterns hanging from ceiling beams cast warm amber pools. Candlesticks on tables add intimate glow.

Handsome young Chinese man [CHAR_LIN] with honest open face, oval-shaped face with strong but gentle jawline, kind dark brown slightly downturned eyes, straight black eyebrows, straight well-proportioned nose, medium-fullness lips curved in slight concentration, warmly tanned skin with faint sun freckles, thick slightly unruly black hair in simple topknot with loose strands at temples, lean strong arms. Wearing undyed natural hemp changshan (#C4B7A6), brown cotton sash (#5D4037), sleeves rolled past forearms, canvas apron. Carrying wooden water bucket outside humble flower shop with wooden panels folded back revealing explosion of colorful orchids, chrysanthemums, flowering branches in ceramic vases. Wide establishing shot, eye-level, 24mm lens. Soft dawn light washing over the scene, morning mist clinging to pressed dirt road. Color palette: natural hemp (#C4B7A6), earth browns (#8B4513), flower colors, soft pink dawn light. Style: live_action, photorealistic, cinematic composition.

-- WORLD BIBLE CONTEXT --
[CHAR_LIN]: A handsome young man with an honest, open face and warm features. His face is oval-shaped with a strong but not harsh jawline. Kind eyes that are dark brown and slightly downturned, giving him a gentle, approachable expression. Straight black eyebrows frame his gaze. His nose is straight and well-proportioned. Lips of medium fullness often curved in a slight smile of concentration. Skin is warmly tanned from outdoor work with a healthy glow, a few faint freckles across his cheeks from sun exposure. His black hair is thick and slightly unruly, pulled back in a simple topknot with loose strands falling around his temples. Medium build with lean but strong arms developed from physical labor. His hands are notably expressive - strong with long fingers, calloused palms, and soil permanently embedded around the fingernails despite washing. Simple working-class hanfu of practical design. Cross-collared changshan in undyed natural hemp fabric (#C4B7A6), loose and comfortable for physical work, sleeves often rolled up past the forearms. A brown cotton sash (#5D4037) ties at the waist. Simple cotton trousers in faded indigo beneath. Cloth shoes with rope soles, worn but well-maintained. Often wears a rough canvas apron stained with soil and plant residue when working.
[LOC_FLOWER_SHOP]: A humble corner shop overflowing with cultivated beauty. Modest wooden structure with open front panels that fold back during business. Wooden tables and tiered shelves holding potted flowers - orchids in ceramic pots, chrysanthemums in bamboo containers, flowering branches in tall vases. Wooden buckets hold cut flowers. Small cramped interior with work table scattered with pruning instruments - shears, thin knives, watering vessels, soft cloths. Bundles of dried flowers hang from ceiling beams. Pressed earth floor, clean-swept.

Young Chinese man [CHAR_LIN] with honest open oval face, kind dark brown downturned eyes showing gentle concentration, warmly tanned skin with faint freckles, thick unruly black hair in simple topknot with loose strands at temples, lean strong forearms visible with sleeves rolled up. Wearing undyed natural hemp changshan (#C4B7A6), brown cotton sash (#5D4037), soil-stained canvas apron. Moving among potted plants with quiet devotion, tilting each ceramic pot toward strengthening morning sunlight. Medium shot, eye-level, 50mm lens. Generous natural dawn light flooding through open shop front, soft and diffused. Color palette: natural hemp (#C4B7A6), earth brown (#5D4037), green foliage (#228B22), warm skin tones. Style: live_action, photorealistic, cinematic composition.

Work-roughened masculine hands with strong long fingers, calloused palms, soil permanently embedded around fingernails, an old thin scar crossing the left thumb.
